text: Blacksmiths Festival is an annual blacksmith festival held in Ivano-Frankivsk, Ukraine The festival is one of a number of cultural events that occur in Ivano-Frankivsk and contributed to the city winning the 2018 PACE Europe Prize. The festival was founded by Sergij Polbotko (Ukrainian Union of Blacksmith Artists). ==See also== *Ironfest (Lithgow) ==References== Category:Festivals in Ukraine Category:Blacksmiths Category:Metal sculptures Category:Metalsmiths
title: Blacksmiths Festival
